content.rendered:
Diabetes Nutrition Program

Book Free Consultation

Program Description

Our diabetes nutrition programme is designed to provide tailored nutrition therapy to people with type 1 and type 2 diabetes. Our programme aims to improve blood sugar control, reduce complications, and improve overall quality of life. Our registered dietitian collaborates with clients to create personalised meal plans that are nutritious, balanced, and delicious. In addition to nutrition, our programme includes education on blood sugar monitoring, medication management, and lifestyle changes that can help with diabetes management. Begin your journey to better diabetes management with our evidence-based nutrition programme today.

Key Benefits of
this Program

Helps regulate blood sugar levels: Proper nutrition can help control blood sugar levels, which is especially important for diabetics. Consuming foods with a low glycemic index can help prevent blood sugar spikes and keep levels stable throughout the day.

Reduces risk of complications:
Diabetic patients are more likely to develop complications such as cardiovascular disease, nerve damage, and kidney damage. By improving blood sugar control and promoting a healthy body weight, proper nutrition can help reduce the risk of these complications. A diet high in antioxidants and anti-inflammatory nutrients can also help protect against the cellular damage and inflammation associated with diabetes.

Improves overall health:
Proper nutrition can help improve overall health and well-being for individuals with diabetes. A balanced diet can help maintain a healthy body weight, reduce the risk of other chronic diseases, such as hypertension and hyperlipidemia, and improve energy levels and mood.

Price and package
details for program

Pakage Variation

Please note that program prices may vary depending on the type and severity of disease, as well as other coexisting medical conditions and the type and frequency of counselling and support needed.

Total Costing & Duration

Starting prices – INR 60,000

Duration – 3 Months

Read Success Stories
from Our Client

Book Free Consultation

@graph.name: Diabetes, diabetic diet Nutrition Program - Echha Joshi
@graph.description: Our diabetes nutrition programme is designed to provide tailored nutrition therapy to people with type 1 and type 2 diabetes. We help in diabetic, prediabetes diet.

@graph.name: Echha Joshi
@graph.description: As a clinical nutritionist, my passion for personalized nutrition is driven by my unwavering commitment to helping individuals achieve optimal health and wellbeing. With a Postgraduate degree in Clinical Nutritional Sciences and a Master's degree in Clinical Nutrition, I possess an extensive understanding of the impact of different foods and nutrients on the body, and how they can be utilized to prevent and treat a range of health conditions. My approach to nutrition is both precise and tailored to each individual's unique needs. My personalized nutrition counseling takes into account medical history, lifestyle, and personal preferences, providing guidance that is both effective and enjoyable. I am experienced in working with individuals who have a wide range of health concerns, including diabetes, heart disease, and gastrointestinal disorders. Beyond my work in individual counseling, I am committed to promoting the importance of nutrition for overall health and disease prevention. My insights and expertise have been widely recognized and respected in the field, with several publications featuring my contributions. If you are seeking a refined, evidence-based approach to nutrition, I would be honored to connect with you. Together, we can work towards achieving optimal health and wellbeing, unlocking your full potential for a healthier and happier life.
